cause.description:
Every day, all around the world, animals are getting abused by heartless people. They need us to stand up for them and give them a voice. We can no longer tolerate innocent animals being treated this way. By joining this cause, you are helping to stop animal cruelty. Invite peole you know to join, because the more people we have involved, the more money we can raise for our furry friends!
1. Animals need us to stand up for them
2. Animal abuse/cruelty is unacceptable
3. Animals have rights too
cause.name: Stand Up For Animal Rights
